reasoning: Team A offers J.K. Dobbins and DeAndre Hopkins to Team B in exchange for Kyren Williams. Team A strengthens its RB position with a high-projection player, Kyren Williams, addressing a need for a more reliable RB option. Team B receives J.K. Dobbins, who has a high projection and can bolster their RB depth, and DeAndre Hopkins, adding depth to their WR position, which is slightly weaker. This trade is mutually beneficial as Team B gains depth in both RB and WR positions, while Team A secures a top-performing RB.
